data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Asadi, Mahdieh, Pešić, Vladimir, Etemadi, Isa (2010): A revised survey of water mites (Acari: Hydrachnidia) from Iran: new synonyms and descriptions of three new species. Zootaxa 2628: 43-55, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.198259
